Detailed Description

Definitions for SPU environment values.

Gets the environment variable specified by the given id.

Note:
The ID should be valid.

Returns:
the env value (of ea_addr_t) specified by the id

static ctk_uint64_t ctk_env_get_gid (  )  [inline, static]

Returns the SPE thread group ID (returns a valid value only if the SPE is created as a member of a SPE thread group)

static ctk_uint32_t ctk_env_get_rank (  )  [inline, static]

Returns the SPE thread 'rank' in the thread group (returns a valid value only if the SPE is created as a member of a SPE thread group)

static void ctk_env_init ( unsigned long long *  envpp  )  [inline, static]

Initializes the SPU environment. SPE programs should call this earlier than any other environment-dependent operations.

Parameters:
[in] envp - the 3rd parameter of the main function
